channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report X-2024020060
item.description:
Report X-2024020060

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-07T15:11:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-25
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS FOUND ON DOCK OF 335. PACKAGE WAS NOTICEABLY LEAKING AT THE TOP OF THE BOX. WHEN OPENED, RESPONDER FOUND THAT THE LIQUID WAS LEAKING OUT OF THE LID. ALL CONTENTS PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP
